entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (greeter_mos_espa_young_pilot.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_16e2abb: I really wish these two would just be quiet for a while. I need to think. On one hand, I do really want to get off of this forsaken rock. But on the other hand, I don't really like the idea of being beholden to Jabba the Hutt or to Lady Valarian.
entries.s_43eb0d5: I could join the military. To be honest, I don't really like the way the Empire seems to treat their pilots. They seem too much like fodder to me. I'm leaning toward the Rebel Alliance. I'm hoping I can fly with them until I'm able to support myself.
entries.s_58da73fe: Seems like Rebel pilots are killed just as often as Imperial ones.
entries.s_5ce080f5: True enough. But at least the Rebels seem to care when they lose a pilot. Might just be because they have so many fewer, but there's not really a better choice for me.
entries.s_c088465d: What other choice do you have?
